content: 2 double_crochet in round 5 repeat round 3 next double_crochet double_crochet in the next 4 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in round 6 chain 2 half_double_crochet around increasing the next repeat around 90 sts one half_double_crochet for every 13 sts round 7 chain 3 double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in 168 188 sts next double_crochet double_crochet in the next 5 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in round 7 repeat round 3 the next repeat around 105 sts round 8 chain 2 half_double_crochet around increasing round 8 chain 3 double_crochet in each double_crochet around one half_double_crochet for every 14 sts 105 sts 180 201 sts round 9 chain 3 double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet in the next 6 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in round 9-10 repeat round 3 proceed to fasten_off weave in ends edging for small size flower with white chain 2 6 single_crochet in 2nd for medium only chain from hook join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet round 11 chain 2 half_double_crochet around increasing change to pink chain 2 3dc chain 2 slip_stitch one half_double_crochet for every 15 sts 214 sts in the same single_crochet slip_stitch to the next single_crochet 6 round 12 repeat round 3 times making 6 petals edging chain 2 double_crochet in same space skip finish off sew appliqué on the band 2 sts slip_stitch on next st repeat around copyright by mimi alelis http //mycrochetstuff blogspot com/ pattern for personal use only do not sell or distribute
